title: Rough Stochastic Analysis with Jumps
authors: Andrew L. Allan and Jost Pieper
abstract:
We present a new version of the stochastic sewing lemma, capable of handling
multiple discontinuous control functions. This is then used to develop a theory
of rough stochastic analysis in a c\`adl\`ag setting. In particular, we define
rough stochastic integration and establish solutions to rough stochastic
differential equations with jump discontinuities in both sources of noise,
along with an It\^o formula for stochastic controlled paths with jumps.
